ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Veterinary Drugs â€” Antimicrobial Resistance)
PrecisREGULATIONS AMENDING THE FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (VETERINARY DRUGS - ANTIMICROBIAL RESISTANCE) in order to limit risks to human health by reducing the likelihood of resistance to antimicrobials in humans as a result of the improved regulatory oversight of antimicrobials sold for veterinary purposes.
